member.name: M:BlackFox.VsWhere.VsInstances.GetWithPackage(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get VS2017+ instances that are completely installed and have a specific package ID installed

member.name: M:BlackFox.VsWhere.VsInstances.GetCompleted(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get VS2017+ instances that are completely installed

member.name: M:BlackFox.VsWhere.VsInstances.GetAllWithLegacy
member.summary:
Get all Visual Studio instances including legacy VS instances (before VS2017: VS .NET 2002 to VS2015).
Note that the information for legacy ones is limited.

member.name: M:BlackFox.VsWhere.VsInstances.GetAll
member.summary:
Get all VS2017+ instances (Visual Studio stable, preview, Build tools, ...)
This method return instances that have installation errors and pre-releases.

member.name: M:BlackFox.VsWhere.VsInstances.GetLegacy
member.summary:
Get legacy VS instances (before VS2017: VS .NET 2002 to VS2015).
Note that the information for legacy ones is limited.
